00120 std::string
00121 HResults::toString(){
00122   std::ostringstream out;
00123   out << ntot_ << " ";
00124   out << Mtot_ << " ";
00125   out << Rtot_ << " ";
00126   out << Mvir_ << " ";
00127   out << Rvir_ << " ";
00128 
00129   out << xcm_.toString() << " ";
00130   out << vcm_.toString() << " ";
00131   out << xmb_.toString() << " ";
00132   out << vmb_.toString() << " ";
00133 
00134   for(int i=0;i<HTotal;++i){
00135     out << " ";
00136     out << npart_[i] << " ";
00137     out << mpart_[i] << " ";
00138     out << lambda_[i] << " ";
00139     out << sigma_[i] << " ";
00140     out << J_[i].toString() << " ";
00141     out << E_[i].toString() << " ";
00142   }
00143   return out.str();
00144 }
